name: 31 Days
description:
31 Days is a first-person platformer about a cat named Phoebe navigating her way through an illegal animal testing facility, with guidance provided by an AI named Leshawniqua. 31 Days was built in Unreal Engine 4, with music provided by Mario Vespa. Will Phoebe survive all 31 days in the Andromeda Testing Facility? 

31 Days was created as a one-man project by Anthony Eckert, a 15-year-old American game developer. The project began on May 24th, 2017 and was completed on June 30th, 2018. Along the way, Mario Vespa joined as music composer, and created all of the music for the game, save for the title theme, made by Noah Goff.

Special thanks to Saul David Abreu and anyone who has ever helped me from the GDL Discord, you guys are the best!

Please consider donating to support us, it means a lot. Thank you!

Oh, and Follow Us on Twitter! https://twitter.com/AnthStudios
